tool_description: Assigns severity scores to customer complaints based on sentiment, urgency indicators, and impact keywords to prioritize resolution efforts.

feedback_text.description: Array of customer feedback text to score for severity

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores corresponding to feedback text (-1.0 to 1.0)

issue_categories.description: Array of issue categories corresponding to feedback entries

urgency_keywords.description: Custom urgency keywords to boost severity scores

category_weights.description: Weight multipliers for different issue categories

impact_threshold.description: Minimum sentiment impact required for high severity (0.0-1.0)

urgency_boost.description: Score multiplier when urgency keywords are detected (1.0-3.0)

length_factor.description: Whether to consider feedback length in severity calculation

customer_history_weight.description: Weight for repeat customer complaint patterns (0.0-2.0)

escalation_indicators.description: Phrases that suggest complaint escalation needs

resolution_complexity.description: Expected resolution complexity factor: simple, moderate, complex

time_sensitivity.description: Whether to factor in time-sensitive language

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: feedback_text, sentiment_scores, and issue_categories must have equal lengths.
Empty input arrays: Provide at least one feedback entry with corresponding sentiment and category.
Invalid sentiment scores: Values must be between -1.0 and 1.0.
Invalid severity scale: Use one of [1-5, 1-10, low-med-high].
Invalid impact threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid urgency boost: Value must be between 1.0 and 3.0.
Invalid customer history weight: Value must be between 0.0 and 2.0.
Invalid resolution complexity: Use one of [simple, moderate, complex].
Mismatched category weights: If provided, must match number of unique issue categories.
usage: Input feedback text with sentiment scores and issue categories. Configure severity parameters and keyword lists to generate prioritized severity scores for complaint resolution.

severity_scores.description: Calculated severity scores for each feedback entry

severity_labels.description: Human-readable severity levels corresponding to scores

priority_ranking.description: Ranked indices of feedback entries by severity (highest first)

high_severity_count.description: Number of complaints classified as high severity
